thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Emma Ferriman

author: Emma Ferriman
title: Emma Ferriman
text: We took a volcano tour on The Big Island, Hawaii with Scott. I think this is the best tour I have ever taken. It was clear Scott really knew the whole park and was very knowledgable. He took us to the most amazing private places not just the tourist sights and gave us a truly unique and personal tour of the amazing landscape. If your are thinking of booking a tour with Scott just do it he's great and so was the tour.
